description: The Louisville Slugger Proven Drop 13 Fastpitch Softball Bat is engineered for players seeking an exceptional blend of power and control. With its balanced swing feel, this bat ensures smooth and effortless swings, making it ideal for players of all skill levels. Certified by USSSA, USA Softball (ASA), NSA, ISA, and WBSC, it meets the highest standards for competitive play. The bat features a 2 1/4-inch barrel diameter and an eye-catching white, blue, and black colorway. Enhanced with an improved cushion grip, it offers superior control, allowing players to perform at their best on the field.
